name: @gmazovec/flow-typer
description: Declarative static and runtime type checking with Flow
author: Gregor Mazovec <gregor.mazovec@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run build:dist && npm run test:type && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:dist && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=html --reporter=text npm run test:unit
scripts.build:dist: flow-remove-types --out-dir dist src && cp src/index.js dist/index.js.flow
